N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 6.15 - Petition to reopen hearing

State Regulations

After the conclusion of a hearing but prior to the making of
an order by the commission, a hearing may, upon petition and in the discretion
of the administrative judge, be reopened for the presentation of new or
additional evidence. Such petition to reopen the hearing shall state in detail
the nature of the new or additional evidence, together with the reasons for the
failure to submit such evidence prior to the conclusion of the hearing. The
commission may upon its own motion and upon reasonable notice reopen a hearing
for the presentation of new or additional evidence. Notes
